entities.description: Have you smoked at least 100 cigarettes in your entire life?
Have you ever vaped nicotine with an e-cigarette or other vaping device?
Age when you first vaped nicotine with an e-cigarette or other vaping device.
Year when you first vaped nicotine with an e-cigarette or other vaping device.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent has smoked at least 100 cigarettes in their life.
Indicates whether the respondent has ever vaped nicotine with an e-cigarette or other vaping device.
Indicates the age when the respondent first vaped nicotine with an e-cigarette or other vaping device.
Indicates the year when the respondent first vaped nicotine with an e-cigarette or other vaping device.
